mapper.select: SELECT c.*, s.service_name FROM cart c JOIN service s ON c.service_no = s.service_no WHERE c.user_no = #{userNo} AND c.cart_no = ( SELECT MIN(c2.cart_no) FROM cart c2 WHERE c2.user_no = c.user_no AND c2.service_no = c.service_no ) ORDER BY c.cart_reg_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(service_no, user_no, cart_amount, partner_name) VALUES (#{serviceNo}, #{userNo}, #{cartAmount}, #{partnerName})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cart_no IN ( ${cartNo} )
